CustomField.description: This field show the Project health based on Risks and Issues linked to the project.
CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF(AND(of_Yellow_Issues_Risks__c = 0, of_Red_Issues_Risk__c = 0) , "/img/samples/light_green.gif", IF(AND(of_Yellow_Issues_Risks__c <> 0, of_Red_Issues_Risk__c = 0) , "/img/samples/light_yellow.gif", IF(of_Red_Issues_Risk__c <> 0 , "/img/samples/light_red.gif","/img/samples/light_green.gif" ))),"Risk Level")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This shows the Project Health based on Risk and Issues logged against the project.
CustomField.label: Project Health
